|prizes = |awards = Lasker Award Harvey Prize National Medal of Science
|religion = |footnotes = |signature = }}'Philip Leder' (b. November 19, 1934) is
an American geneticist. He was born in Washington, D.C. and studied at Harvard
University, graduating in 1956. In 1960, he graduated from Harvard Medical
School and completed his medical residency at the University of Minnesota.
categories: Members of the United States National Academy of Sciences
Recipients of the Albert Lasker Award for Basic Medical Research
